gaia::net::IServerSocketListener Class Reference

Detailed Description

Implement this interface to handle accept and error event issued by a ServerSocket.

Called when a server socket received an evnet. Method of this class should not blocked, or IO thread will be blocked. 

  class Listener: public IServerSocketListener {
    // ...  
    // ...
  };
  Listener listener;
  mServerSocket.addServerSocketListener(&listener);

virtual void gaia::net::IServerSocketListener::onAccepted ( ClientSocket *  socket,
ServerSocket *  server 
) [pure virtual]

When a connection is established.

After calling listen(), ServerSocket accepts connection automatically, This function is called when a connection is established.

Parameters:
socketSocket that connected to client. ClientSocket should be deleted when it is no longer use.
serverServer that calls this function.
